title: What Smart TV was the easiest to assemble? - Quora

response.answer_text: The only assembly required on modern TVs is either attaching the TV panel to a base/pedestal/legs or wall mounting the TV. If you go the first route (wall mounting a TV is a job best left to professionals), it’s a pretty simple job that should take no more than five minutes — provided you have a second person to help you if you have a bigger TV.
